title: Understanding the Watch Window
text: The Watch Window is a tool in Excel that allows you to monitor changes in specific cells while working on a different part of the worksheet.

title: Locating the Watch Window
text: The Watch Window can be accessed from the Formulas tab in Excel. It is part of the Formula Auditing tools.

title: Opening the Watch Window
text: To open the Watch Window, you need to navigate to the Formulas tab and then click on the Watch Window option under Formula Auditing.
choices: click "Add Watch" on Watch Window toolbar
